EmailTemplate.name: SB Dispatch Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: SB Dispatch Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Professor {!Case.Contact},
A thermal copy of the thesis entitled “XX” has been sent to you. Once you have received the thermal copy, can you kindly via email.
Upon completion of the examination it would be greatly appreciated if you could return the thesis copy to our office.
Yours sincerely,
_______________________
​ Monash Graduate Education Chancellery Building D 26 Sports Walk Monash University, VIC 3800, Australia T: +61 3 990 53009 W: www.monash.edu/graduate-research Campus Map: www.monash.edu/campuses/clayton/ CRICOS Provider No. 00008C
We're listening….your feedback helps us improve Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/MonashGraduateEducation
{!Case.Thread_Id}
